qrCode.question: How do I generate a QR code for visitors?
qrCode.answer: Go to the "Visits" tab, tap "Generate QR Code", enter the visitor's details and select the access type.

joinCommunity.question: How do I join my community?
joinCommunity.answer: You need an invitation code from your administrator. Go to "Join my community" and enter the code.

changePassword.question: How do I change my password?
changePassword.answer: Go to Profile > Settings > Change password. We will send you a verification email.

contactAdmin.question: How do I contact my administrator?
contactAdmin.answer: In your community section you will find your administrator's contact information.

panicButton.question: How does the panic button work?
panicButton.answer: The panic button is a premium service that sends immediate alerts to security and emergency contacts.

panicButton.title: Panic Button
panicButton.subtitle: 24/7 personal protection
panicButton.message: The Panic Button service is available as a premium subscription. Would you like to learn more?

unpaid.title: Account Suspended for Non-Payment
unpaid.description: Your account has been suspended due to pending payments. To reactivate your account, please pay the outstanding amounts.

movedOut.description: Your account has been deactivated because you no longer reside at this location. If this is an error, contact administration.

ruleViolation.title: Account Suspended
ruleViolation.description: Your account has been suspended for rule violation. Contact administration for more information.

default.title: Account Suspended
default.description: Your account has been suspended. Contact administration for more information.

infoBox.title: What does this mean?

infoBox.item2: Your existing QR codes are blocked
infoBox.item3: You won't be able to access certain features
infoBox.reactivate: To reactivate your account, contact your community administration.
